channel.title: Posts on Alex Otara
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Alex Otara

item.title: What is a JWT and how to generate one
item.description: Store information in an easy-to-access manner, both for developers and computers using a JWT.

item.title: What Do You Make Of OpenAI's Voice And Vision Capabilities?
item.description: ChatGPT can now see, hear, and speak. What does this mean to Google and Apple who have already tried it with Assistant and Siri before?

item.title: Just Start!
item.description: Discover how that initial push can propel you forward, instill a sense of learning by doing, and ultimately help you surmount the obstacles that hinder progress.

item.title: Software Engineering â€” An Overrated Career or A Path to Prosperity?
item.description: Is software engineering the golden ticket to prosperity and fulfillment, or is it overrated in our hyper-digital age?

item.title: Adding GoatCounter to Hugo
item.description: GoatCounter is a web analytics platform that aims at offering easy to use and meaningful privacy-friendly web analytics as an alternative to Google Analytics or Matomo.

item.title: Create Your Blog with Hugo's Static Site Generator
item.description: Discover the simplicity of building your own websites using Static Site Generators. Let’s explore how SSGs streamline the process of web development making it accessible to all.
